pages.title: The Alecubus
pages.text:
The $(item)Alecubus/$ is your end goal. It is the cube form of the mighty Alec.
It is an item which requires you to master many of the pack's mods to make.$(br2)As an inhabitant of this world it might just be you, yes you, $(l)$(playername)/$, to first create the one and only $(item)Alecubus/$!

In order to create the $(item)Alecubus/$, you must start from nothing but a computer and work your way up through many components in order to arrive at the $(item)Alecubus/$. On this journey, you will venture through $(thing)Create/$, $(thing)Mana and Artifice/$, $(thing)Powah/$, $(thing)Pneumaticcraft/$, $(thing)Botania/$, $(thing)Nuclear Science/$, $(thing)Assembly Line Machines/$, $(thing)PSI/$, $(thing)Blood Magic/$, $(thing)Draconic Evolution/$ and finally $(thing)Mekanism/$.$(br2)Some might say it'd be silly to take on such a journey alone... Or at all.
